ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like a great idea! Kiamone, Bard of Freeport Fennin Ro ... all ... money.
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like a great idea!

Kiamone, Bard of Freeport
Fennin Ro



> Anyone else here think that they should make joint bank accounts? Have a
> limit on the number of people that can go into it. This would be great for
> people into trade skills. 2 friends smithing together, put all profit into
> the account. Have it completely seperate from the original ones. And have
all
> players consent to it, so that Verant can't do anything about stolen
money.
> Just say sorry. I think this would be very cool. What other people think?
>
> Kondor, Half Elf Paladin
> ~Veeshan~
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: bringing the world together.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
>
